name: UX Thinking
description: UX Thinking (UXT) is a training concept that enables product managers, product owners, UX professionals and software developers to plan and implement digital development projects in interdisciplinary teams in an agile and human-centered manner.

name: Camunda BPM for Java-Developers
description: Three-day training for developers to prepare using the open source Camunda BPM platform successfully in software projects.
